description:
Modding platform for GI, HSR, WW and ZZZ

Features
  One Ring — Allows to launch and manage all supported Model Importers in unified and convenient way
  Plug-and-Play — Configures any supported game and installs its XXMI instance automatically
  Custom Launch — Can be configured to start game in almost every possible way via Advanced Settings
  Automatic Updates — Always keeps XXMI instances and itself up-to date
  Safe to Use — Verifies authenticity of XXMI libraries and own downloads
Supported Model Importers
  WWMI - Wuthering Waves Model Importer GitHub
  ZZMI - Zenless Zone Zero Model Importer GitHub
  SRMI - Honkai: Star Rail Model Importer GitHub
  GIMI - Genshin Impact Model Importer GitHubs
Available Editions (Installation Guide):
- For Native Windows App mode download .msi installer.
- For Portable or Linux setup download .zip version.
Support on Patreon
Additions
- [Settings]: Added checkbox to Launch Options in General Settings to toggle field usage. For WWMI it also affects which .exe file launcher starts.
Improvements
- [UI]: Improved quality of some background images and "select game to mod" tiles.
Optimizations
- [UI]: Switched background images format to .webp to save few MB.
Bugfixes
- [Custom Themes]: Fixed missing HIMI background image error.
- [WWMI]: Fixed game ignoring Launch Options after 1.9.0 update.
